biotools.summary: ARTS is a fully automated biomarker that outputs a score linked to the likelihood a person suffers from arteriolosclerosis based on brain MRI data (3D T1w, T2w FLAIR, DTI data) and basic demographic information (age at MRI, sex). The higher the ARTS score, the higher the likelihood of arteriolosclerosis.

bioschemas.name: ARTS
